content:
Hi! Welcome to the CS101 course. We built this to help you become more familiar with taking a course on HEBS prior to your first day of class.

In a live course, this section is where all of the latest course announcements and updates would be. To get started with this demo course, view the courseware page and click “Example Week 1” in the left hand navigation.

We tried to make this both fun and informative. We hope you like it. – The HEBS Team
